full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE MKHA' LDING NAG PO'I GTOR 'BUL DANG BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES RDO RJE MKHA' LDING NAG PO'I GTOR 'BUL DANG, 'PHRIN LAS 'TSOL BSKUL BZLOG DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI MU GE MI TSAN GYI GRVA RIGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB KYI BSKUL BA LTAR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
